name: Bloodground
description:
Bloodground is an intense top down shooter,the first game of Dirtroad Games,plenty of blood and gore,waves of zombies are coming,you and your gun will make the difference to survive.

CHARACTERISTICS:

*Different types of zombies.

*Two final bosses.

*Different types of devastating and cool power ups.

*Four different selectable weapons and one unlockable.

*Dynamic rain.

*A lot of blood and gore.

CONTROLS:

*Movement: W,S,A,D

*Shoot: LEFT MOUSE

*Sprint: SPACE BAR

*Pause: P
